headingForEmptyOrderTemplateList.comment: The heading to show if order template list is empty
headingForEmptyOrderTemplateList.value: Looks like you have not created any order templates.

textForEmptyOrderTemplateList.comment: The text to show if order template list is empty
textForEmptyOrderTemplateList.value: Order templates will be saved to your account. You can reuse them in the future to speed up the checkout process.
